body.name: Led Desk Lamp for Office Home - Eye Caring Architect lamp with Clamp,Dual Screen Computer Monitor Gooseneck Smart Light: 24W 5 Color Flexible Adjustable Lighting Table Lamp for Study Drafting
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 19 hrs 30 mins
features: 【Remote Control & Multifunction】This double head LED desk lamp is equipped with a wireless smart remote control, allowing you to choose the most suitable mode faster and more portable. It also owns two special functions (memory function and timing function ). The memory function can keep the desk lamp in the last used mode and brightness without resetting. The timer function can make the desk lamp turn off automatically after working for 1 hour, preventing us from overworking.

【Ultra Wide Ultra Bright & Easy to Install】The LED light is designed with dual lamp heads, the lamp bars can be extended up to 31.5 inches, and it can evenly cover a desk with a width of 71 inches and provide sufficient and comfortable lighting. The installation process is easy and simple, no additional tools are required. The adjustable metal clamp design can easily clip the desk lamp to the edge of the table top up to 2 inches, freeing up more table space.

【Multi-Mode & Gooseneck Design】5 color temperatures (3000K-5500K) × 5 levels of brightness (20%-100%), 25 light combination modes can be realized. It also has night light mode and reading mode to meet your various lighting needs. The desk lamp is designed with a 360° gooseneck and 180° foldable swing arms, and the lamp head can also be freely rotated 270° front and back, allowing you to turn the desk lamp to any angle to provide you with the most suitable lighting range.

【Eye Protection & Multiple Scenes】This LED desk lamp is evenly illuminated, with no glare, no flicker, and no blue light hazard. Soft and even lighting helps to relieve eye fatigue caused by long-time watching computer screens, thus protecting our eyes. This is very suitable for large workbenches with wide curved monitors or dual monitors, drafting desks, and architect desks, allowing you to have a good lighting environment when working, reading, studying, drawing sewing, and crafting.

【24/7 Quality Service】Our LED desk lamp has good heat dissipation, long service life, energy saving and power saving, no need to replace frequently. Our export products are 100% quality inspected, please rest assured of our product quality. We promise to provide a 365-day warranty for the product, if you encounter any problems during use, please feel free to contact us, we will provide you with the best solution in the shortest possible time.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The foldable swing arm design makes it more flexible and saves more space.Soft and even lighting helps relieve eye fatigue caused by long-time viewing of computer screens and protects your eyes.Equipped with wide and adjustable double lamp heads, allowing you to customize this lamp to accommodate your different lighting needs.
Ultra Wide Ultra Bright Double Head LED Desk Lamp With Clip The max length of the head can reach 31.5 inch. It can evenly cover a 71 inch wide desk and give enough lighting for your work station.

Easy to Install Flexible adjustable clip design, maximum desk thickness 2 inches. Rotate 270° Freely Provides wider and greater lighting coverage, the direction of the light can be adjusted freely. Metal Lamp Body Made of solid aluminum alloy with strong heat dissipation; 192 pcs super bright lamp beads. 180° Adjustable Swing Arm Foldable design is convenient to carry and save space.

High Color Rendering Index CRI is an indicator that describes the ability of a light source to restore the color of an object. The higher the CRI index (the maximum value is 100), the more realistic the color of the object will appear.
The adjustable metal clamp design The adjustable metal clamp design can easily clip the desk lamp to the edge of the table top up to 2 inches, freeing up more table space.

Applicable To Multiple Occasions This LED desk lamp can be fixed at any position you want, very suitable for large workbenches, drafting desks, and architect desks, providing you with enough and comfortable comfort when working at home, studying, drawing, reading, sewing, and crafting lighting environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Customizable Desk Lamp Reduces Eye Strain and Fatigue
reviews.reviewText: This desk lamp has been a game changer for improving eye strain at my work station. I purchased it specifically to provide better lighting over my dual monitor setup, with the goal of reducing eye fatigue after long hours staring at screens. I'm happy to report after just a couple days of use, I've already noticed a positive difference.The fully adjustable gooseneck design makes it easy to position the light bar exactly where I need it, evenly extending over both my monitors. The dimmable LEDs provide just the right brightness without causing any screen glare. I love the ability to customize the color temperature from cool daylight to warm yellow light as needed throughout the day.The wireless remote is very convenient for adjusting settings without having to reach up and fiddle with buttons on the lamp. The different modes help dial in varying degrees of brightness and warmth. It's nice to have presets, but so simple to manually set your own preference too.Overall, this lamp feels very well-made and sturdy. The desk clamp and adjustable joints maintain position without drooping over time. For the price, I'm impressed with the performance, sturdiness and customizability. If you're looking to improve your home office or workspace lighting with focus on reducing eye strain, this lamp delivers. I'm seeing benefits already and would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my home office
reviews.reviewText: Very well made - looks nice. So many ways to angle and adjust the lights and the brightness and color warmth options are great. The remote for the controls is nice because it isn’t on top where it can move the lights or near where it clamps which may be hard to reach. The remote can be located conveniently for me. And I like the 2 presets - nightlight and reading. Click on the one most like what I am looking for at the moment and then fine tune from there. This is a great lamp

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great surface light !!
reviews.reviewText: I use a dual-head (2 monitors) on my desktop and was looking for a light source that covered my entire desktop without any hot-spots or deep shadows. This unit is amazing. Excellent control of brightness, coverage of surface, ability to position and orient the light is very nice. Light color correction & night light mode all controlled from a light remote control, think Blue-Tooth type of connection. This control unit can be placed anywhere and is very convenient to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid little desk lamp
reviews.reviewText: This thing is great and versatile. I love the different lighting temperatures so you can adjust it to your needs. It bends to where you need it to and the wireless controller make it easy to control. I use it more than my main light in home office even during the day. Works great over my dual monitor setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ordered 2 more IMMEDIATELY
reviews.reviewText: This light is exactly what I was looking for! The amount of light that it produces is perfect, the strength of the light is perfect and it is constructed to be very aesthetically pleasing. There are cheaper lights out there, but I didn’t like how the cord had to be wrapped around the gooseneck, where this light plugs in near the base so the cord is very easy to hide. I also like that the gooseneck has a sturdy, rubber or silicone sleeve that has a matte finish and that completely covers it, which makes it much more aesthetic. It is very well constructed. The gooseneck is easy to articulate and bend and flex the light into the position that you want it in without being stiff or too loose. Also, the actual lightbulbs can be swiveled to point in any direction that you want. I currently have mine facing up at my white ceiling , which splashes the illumination across my entire office without being hard on my eyes. This light literally arrived 15 minutes ago and as soon as I plugged it in I ordered two more. It is perfect in every way! And as a bonus, I love how you can control the temperature and brightness of the light via the puck sized controller. if you work on your computer a lot for your job, for a hobby, if you’re a graphics designer, into photography, this light is perfect! I can’t think of anything that this light would not be perfect for. It would also be great for people who sew or do any kind of detail work where you want to be able to control the light source.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Adjustable Desk Lamp
reviews.reviewText: I'll try to break this down.. I am not someone who deducts points for delivery mishaps etc.. I believe that should not be part of the overall review..With that said I am very very pleased with my purchase. The remote control is HUGE for me as it allows for lighting changes such as tone, brightness, timer, night light etc... The actual lamp is easy to setup and is mindboggling adjustable. The lamp stem is very sturdy and flexible..For me this is one of the best purchases I've made on Amazon... I'm easy to please I guess :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for small spaces
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this light. I have a very small space for my desk and computer (it's crammed underneath a staircase). I have just inches above my monitors where a light can fit. Although this lamp is taller than that space, I was able to bend it to fit into the space. I love all the settings, too. I can adjust the brightness, color temperature for myself or use preset lighting. I love that the remote for the light is wireless - no additional wires tracking across my desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I needed an adjustable light for the extension of my desk. All components of this light are well made and sturdy. The two wings are adjustable and the neck can be bend to any position needed. The clamp holds tight to the surface. The light is bright but not blinding. It comes with a remote disc for power and brightness levels. I would buy this product again.
